recipes.title: Double Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Bake for 12 minutes.

recipes.title: Snickerdoodles
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Cream butter and sugar.
Add eggs and mix.
Stir in flour and cream of tartar.
Bake for 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Apple Fritter Cookies
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Scoop onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Olive Oil Cake
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix olive oil and sugar.
Add eggs and mix.
Stir in flour.
Fold in berries.
Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Funfetti Cake
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Add eggs one at a time and mix.
Gradually add flour and mix until combined.
Fold in sprinkles and bake for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegan Gluten Free Chocolate Cake
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Melt the chocolate and mix with almond milk and sugar.
Sift in flour and cocoa powder.
Mix until smooth and pour into a cake pan.
Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Brown Butter Brownies
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Brown the butter in a saucepan.
Mix in sugar and eggs in a bowl.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Pour into a baking dish and bake for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Lemon Brownies
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Beat butter and sugar together.
Add eggs and mix well.
Stir in flour, zest, and lemon juice.
Bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.title: Fudgy Raspberry Brownies
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Mix in sugar and eggs.
Add flour and fold in raspberries.
Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: No Churn Chocolate Oreo Ice Cream
directions: Whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold in sweetened condensed milk and crushed Oreos.
Pour into a container and freeze for 4 hours.

recipes.title: No Churn Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream
directions: Whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold in sweetened condensed milk, strawberry puree, and cheesecake chunks.
Pour into a container and freeze for 4 hours.

recipes.title: No Churn Blackberry Waffle Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
directions: Whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold in sweetened condensed milk, blackberries, crushed waffle cones, and chocolate chips.
Pour into a container and freeze for 4 hours.

recipes.title: Golden Graham S’mores Bars
directions: Melt butter and mix with marshmallows and chocolate chips.
Fold in Golden Grahams.
Press into a baking dish and cool before cutting.

recipes.title: Apple Fritter Bread
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Muffins
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Mix all ingredients together.
Scoop batter into muffin tin and bake for 20 minutes.
